title: "Neon Metropolis"
content:
# Welcome to Neon Metropolis

Neon Metropolis is a website dedicated to showcasing the latest and greatest in futuristic cityscapes. Our minimalist graphics and dark, moody color schemes are designed to transport you to a world of neon lights and sleek skyscrapers.

Explore our collection of high-quality wallpapers, perfect for desktop backgrounds, phone screens, or even as inspiration for your next creative project. With new additions added regularly, there's always something fresh to discover.

Whether you're a fan of cyberpunk, sci-fi, or just appreciate stunning visual design, Neon Metropolis has something for everyone. So come on in, and immerse yourself in the electrifying world of the future.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist graphic of a futuristic cityscape, with glowing neon lights and a dark and moody color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
